code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ServicesIntro=()=>{const[displayText,setDisplayText]=useState('');const[currentIndex,setCurrentIndex]=useState(0);const fullText="Make the right first impression";useEffect(()=>{const timer=setTimeout(()=>{if(currentIndex<fullText.length){setDisplayText(fullText.substring(0,currentIndex+1));setCurrentIndex(currentIndex+1);}},100);return()=>clearTimeout(timer);},[currentIndex,fullText]);useEffect(()=>{const startTimer=setTimeout(()=>{setCurrentIndex(0);},500);return()=>clearTimeout(startTimer);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"services-intro",className:"services-intro",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"animated-title",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:displayText}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"cursor",children:"|"})]})})});};export default ServicesIntro;
